replies.body:
Thanks

Opinions?
At first I was against your promotion to senior mod, but now I can't imagine the senior staff team without you.
You are eager to help and get quite a bit done. I don't really talk to you that much because of time zones and because I don't have anything to do with you..
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks

Opinions?
At first I was against your promotion to senior mod, but now I can't imagine the senior staff team without you.
You are eager to help and get quite a bit done. I don't really talk to you that much because of time zones and because I don't have anything to do with you..

replies.body:
Thanks!

Opinions?
I neither like nor dislike you. You are active on the server, which I appreciate, but most of the time I don't have anything to do with you. Sometimes you can get a bit annoying with unnecessary shit on discord, but I acted the same when I freshly got mod. You should be more active on TS tho.

Fav pizza topping?
Champignons, Salami, Cheese, Chicken strips/Gyros and Salad.

Fav part of being a mod?
The insight into the staff team and to be honest the permissions are a neat thing to have. Also some of the staff are cool.

What do you hope to achieve as a mod?
Hope and actually achieving something are different things. In terms of hope: getting SR. In terms of actually achieving: 3 years as staff.

replies.body:
opinions?
Cool guy. You know how to do stuff efficiently. You once were very active on TS and the servers, you seemed like you were tryharding for SR, but now you are laid back and calm (and sometimes annoying). Yet you encourage others to do their best. I would consider you as one of my closer friends on avicus).

sexiest player and staff member?
I am both. You are second place :)

fuck kiss kill: [you choose the 3 people]
You, Laurence, Shadow

are yer gonna get senoir yet?
Neigh. But yea, I probably never will get Sr. I'm too laid back and despise a lot of community members.

who is??/
Wat?

replies.body:
Thanks a lot!

Opinions?
You are pretty cool, yet you get heated up in discussions regarding politics or things you don't agree with.
You're still the red head swimmer girl with occasional glasses.
Also you're life pretty much revolves around school.

Should I cough come back?
Whatever you choose. I would like to see you coming back, but you probably never will achieve anything. 

Favourite thing about Avicus?
Being moderator and the laid back mods.

replies.body:
Opinions?
You probably know who referred you. You turned out quite fine, keep going.
Yet we don't do anything together anymore. The occasional TS talks are fun.

How's Life?
Almost done with getting my driver's license (manual). Only 2 more exams and a presentation next week, then I'm done with this semester. I don't get paid enough at work, which is not nize, but meh. Anything else is pretty good.

What's Good?
Money, Pizza, Life (sometimes), You

replies.body:
Opinions?
You are great! It's amazing that we lasted that long and I hope that will continue!
Overall you are a great mod and a great person as well. I think the first time we really got into contact was when you needed a yml and you didn't have skype so we sent email to each other :D Please don't change!

Favorite cake?
Cheese or Chocolate Cake

Favorite animal?
Cats

You too! Keep that streak going!

replies.body:
Opinions ?
You are stupid, but you learn each day. The shit with the forged screenshot is the best example for that. Before that you were annoying as hell, but now you toned it down a bit. In my opinion the ban for the screenshot shouldn't be appealed to teach you a lesson. You should definitely work on yourself like me or any other person.

Do you think that you and {tag=5a0b55defddb448caf5070856cbf39ee} deserve SrMod ?
If we just go by the amount of time we spent and dedicated to avicus, yes.
Sadly that's not how it works. Yet I would say Badger deserves it more because he really likes moderating and still has motivation to do it. And I feel like it should be valued that even after 2 years he gets on the server, moderates and helps out a lot of players and most importantly he didn't turn into a salty cunt,

Best Moment in Avicus ?
The hype up party on plugdj for the Avicore update (~ 3 years ago)

replies.body:
Opinions?
You were pretty annoying in your junior mod trail, but now you are chill. From what I see you can be serious and funny at the same time and found the right balance that there's yet someone who "hates" you, at least I didn't encountered that does so. You definitely should come on TS more!

Favorite Squid ethnicity?
German, close behind is Japanese. 

Origin of your IGN?
I wanted to invent a new word, that was back in 2011. Didn't really use that for anything until I bought my own minecraft account.

あなたはGoogle翻訳を使用しますか? 
^Cool text
Yes I do and yes it is

opinions :D
You are a weird fellow, but I like that. You are pretty decent in pvp and should be more active on the forums (in regard of your second question). You never fail to make me laugh and your snaps are amazing ;)

should i apply for mod?
Be more active and go for it!

opinions on {tag=58d037b7dccc4f2eadd4011c6f484555} cause he didn't ask xd
If he continues to send those snaps to Lee Ann, then his future will be dark... He finally has to engage lol
Anyways I understand why guys hit on him :D and he's a decent mod.

favourite game mode on avicus
DTM and the former CTH.

is the mod team basically your harem?
Not the whole team, just a selected few ;D
